definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The king's men had been subverted and they killed him in the night.
sentences.chinese: 國王的屬下已被策反，在夜裏把國王殺了。

sentences.english: It was the largest temple in the whole country, and the emperor told his men to take me there.
sentences.chinese: 那是全國最大的廟，皇帝叫他的屬下把我載到那裏。

sentences.english: Try to discourage such familiarities from your subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓屬下對你這樣不拘禮儀。

sentences.english: Than Shwe well knows how a low-profile subordinate can overthrow the leader.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞深知一個低調的屬下能夠對其上級進行顛覆。

sentences.english: He ordered his pilots to employ their harpoons and tow cables to ensnare the walkers' legs.
sentences.chinese: 他命令屬下的飛行員用魚叉和拖纜綁住步行機的長腿。

sentences.english: Q. Do you recall the toughest thing one of your employees ever said to you?
sentences.chinese: 你記得你的屬下跟你說過的最難受的一件事嗎？

sentences.english: Her subaltern educational theory has brought new insight to the education in China.
sentences.chinese: 其屬下教育理論對中國的教育有重要的啓示作用。

sentences.english: He ordered his men to drive me out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 他命令他的屬下把我趕出利國。

sentences.english: Junli has a large-scale printing factory, with strong technology, advanced craft;
sentences.chinese: 君利屬下有大型印刷廠，技術雄厚，工藝先進。

sentences.english: Mr Wang's views did not strike an instant chord with his subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 王先生的想法並沒有與他的屬下一拍即合。

sentences.english: The prime minister is accorded authority over the ministries.
sentences.chinese: 根據協議，總理具有領導他屬下的部會的權力。

sentences.english: Only then can his subordinates take a sip in strict observance of their seniority.
sentences.chinese: 之後，屬下才能依照年資淺淺啜飲一口。

sentences.english: His staff play a man named Yang, withdrawn, Ne in words.
sentences.chinese: 他的屬下有個叫楊戲的，性格孤僻，訥於言語。

sentences.english: This is actually an "appeasement ritual" instigated by the SUBORDINATE wolf.
sentences.chinese: 這的確是一個被低階的屬下狼唆使的“妥協儀式”。

sentences.english: Spivak also points out that the Subaltern cannot be spoken for.
sentences.chinese: 此外，斯皮瓦克還指出了屬下不能被代言的問題。

definition: to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to arrange an interview/an appointment (with the foreign ambassador)
